id.description: ID of the Instruction. Must be unique in the scope of the Resource Manager, for at least the duration of the session between Resource Manager and CEM.

power_profile_id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerProfileDefinition of which the PPBC.PowerSequence is being selected and scheduled by the CEM.

sequence_container_id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerSequnceContainer of which the PPBC.PowerSequence is being selected and scheduled by the CEM.

power_sequence_id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerSequence that is being selected and scheduled by the CEM.

execution_time.description: Indicates the moment the PPBC.PowerSequence shall start. When the specified execution time is in the past, execution must start as soon as possible.

abnormal_condition.description: Indicates if this is an instruction during an abnormal condition
